Name: Royal Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne.
Review: The classic Cosmopolitan with a layer of fizz on top adding a biscuity complexity. Sex And The City meets Ab Fab.
History: Created in 2003 by Wayne Collins, London, England. For more recipes, origins and history behind the Cosmopolitan cocktail, see our Cosmopolitan page .
Nutrition: One serving of Royal Cosmopolitan contains 116 calories
